job.title: Machine Learning Systems Engineer
job.description: AirHop Communications is a world recognized leader in wireless network automation and optimization technology, platforms, and solutions. We are seeking a Machine Learning (ML) Systems Engineer who will develop algorithms using advanced ML techniques to optimize the Radio Access Network (RAN). Job Responsibilities: Develop ML algorithms to optimize the performance of the 4G/5G Radio Access Network. Develop simulations, test scenarios, and experiments to validate ML solutions in collaboration with the system engineering team. Collaborate with other engineering teams to implement and deploy ML algorithms in live networks. Validate and monitor ML solution performance in field tests and live network Stay current with relevant developments in the ML field Qualifications: The position requires: Master's in engineering, computer science, or equivalent. PhD preferred. At least 2 years of experience developing ML solutions Deep understanding of machine learning tools and algorithms Excellent knowledge of Python and Pandas is a must Experience with Pytorch is a plus Experience with reinforcement learning, time series analysis and Graph Neural Networks is a plus Experience in 4G and 5G cellular Radio Access Networks (RAN) is a plus About the company: Please see www.airhopcomm.com
